trans-unit.source: Enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values sent by a client during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 使 ASP.NET 能够读取客户端在 Web 请求期间发送的 HTTP 值。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class are exposed through the `Request` properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> classes.
trans-unit.target: 方法和属性<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>通过公开类`Request`属性<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>类。

trans-unit.source: To access data from the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables%2A> collections, you can write `Request["key"]`, as shown in the example for the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 从访问数据<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables%2A>集合，你可以编写`Request["key"]`中的示例所示<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Unicode support for <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class members requires IIS version 6.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 支持<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类成员要求安装 IIS 6.0 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The following examples access the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> instance for the current request by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例访问<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>通过使用当前请求的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类。

trans-unit.source: You can use simplified syntax for accessing data from the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用简化的语法访问中的数据<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can write `Request["key"]`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编写`Request["key"]`。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows how to retrieve a query string value when loading a page.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何在加载页面时检索查询字符串值。

trans-unit.source: The next example shows how to check if the request is authenticated and retrieve the raw URL.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例演示如何检查请求进行身份验证并检索的原始 URL。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=191455).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=191455)。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> class to write the values of several <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class properties to a file.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>类写入多个值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类到文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For properties that are of type string, the values are HTML encoded as they are written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 对于字符串类型的属性，值为 HTML 编码写入到文件。

trans-unit.source: Properties that represent a collection are looped through, and each key/value pair that they contain is written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 表示集合的属性将遍历，并且它们包含每个键/值对会写入到文件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 与请求关联的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The information regarding the URL of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 关于当前请求的 URL 的信息。

trans-unit.source: The entire query string sent with the request (everything after the <c>'?'</c>).
trans-unit.target: 与请求一同发送的整个查询字符串（“?”<c></c>之后的所有内容）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create your own instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建你自己的实例<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class are exposed through the `Request` property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> classes.
trans-unit.target: 方法和属性<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>通过公开类`Request`属性<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.
trans-unit.target: 强制地终止基础 TCP 连接，会导致任何显著的 I/O 失败。

trans-unit.source: You might use this method in response to an attack by a malicious HTTP client.
trans-unit.target: 可使用此方法来响应恶意 HTTP 客户端的攻击。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Any thread may call it at any time.
trans-unit.target: 任何线程可能随时对它进行调用。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be used in integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅可以在集成模式下使用。

trans-unit.source: If you invoke it in classic mode, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在经典模式下调用它，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To determine the pipeline mode, use <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定管道模式，请使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string array of client-supported MIME accept types.
trans-unit.target: 获取客户端支持的 MIME 接受类型的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: A string array of client-supported MIME accept types.
trans-unit.target: 客户端支持的 MIME 接受类型的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: The following code example captures the multiple values returned by the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AcceptTypes%2A> property into an object variable and writes the number and name of each valueto a separate line of HTTP output.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例通过返回的多个值捕获<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AcceptTypes%2A>到对象变量的属性和写入 HTTP 输出的单独的行的数量和每个值设置的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the anonymous identifier for the user, if present.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户的匿名标识符(如果存在)。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the current anonymous user identifier.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前匿名用户标识符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A> property assigns a long-lived unique identifier to a non-authenticated user, which can be used to track the user or assign profile properties to that user without storing data in a `Session` object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A>属性将长期存在的唯一标识符分配给未经身份验证用户，这可以用于跟踪用户或为该用户分配配置文件属性，而不将数据存储在`Session`对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A> property is tracked using a cookie, but it can be set to use the URI when the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless%2A> attribute in the anonymous identification configuration section is set to either the <xref:System.Web.HttpCookieMode.UseUri>, <xref:System.Web.HttpCookieMode.UseDeviceProfile>, or <xref:System.Web.HttpCookieMode.AutoDetect> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A>使用 cookie，跟踪属性，但可以将其设置为使用 URI 时<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless%2A>匿名标识配置部分中的属性设置为<xref:System.Web.HttpCookieMode.UseUri>， <xref:System.Web.HttpCookieMode.UseDeviceProfile>，或<xref:System.Web.HttpCookieMode.AutoDetect>值。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly clear the cookie if you no longer want it available, for example when an anonymous user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不再需要可用，例如可以匿名用户进行身份验证，则必须显式清除 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Anonymous identification is used when there is a need to identify entities that are not authenticated and when authorization is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要确定未经过身份验证的实体时，并需要授权时，使用匿名标识。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [anonymousIdentification Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2bd927ef-9057-4703-9c55-4cfb6d7d0929)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[anonymousIdentification 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2bd927ef-9057-4703-9c55-4cfb6d7d0929)

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A> property by handling the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event in the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A>属性通过处理<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>Global.asax 文件中的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example has two parts:
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有两个部分：

trans-unit.source: A method in the Global.asax file that handles the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理的 Global.asax 文件中的方法<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件。

trans-unit.source: A Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体页中。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A> property by handling the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event in the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A>属性通过处理<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>Global.asax 文件中的事件。

trans-unit.source: The method that is named `AnonymousIdentification_Creating` sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A> property when an anonymous ID is created.
trans-unit.target: 名为的方法`AnonymousIdentification_Creating`设置<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A>属性时创建一个匿名的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows how to display the new <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A> that is created by the `AnonymousIdentification_Creating` event handler in the preceding example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示如何显示新<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AnonymousID%2A>，它由创建`AnonymousIdentification_Creating`前面示例中的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ASP.NET application's virtual application root path on the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务器上 ASP.NET 应用程序的虚拟应用程序根路径。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the current application.
trans-unit.target: 当前应用程序的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to construct a URL relative to the application root from a page or Web user control that is not in the root directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于构造相对于从页或不在根目录下的 Web 用户控件的应用程序根 URL。

trans-unit.source: This allows pages and shared controls that exist at different levels of a directory structure to use the same code to link to resources at fixed locations in the application.
trans-unit.target: 这允许页面和存在于目录结构，以便使用相同的代码将链接到应用程序中的固定位置的资源的不同级别的共享的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.Write%2A> method to HTML-encode and then write the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A> property to a text file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.Write%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法然后将的值写入<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A>到文本文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: It assumes the existence of a <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> object named `sw`.
trans-unit.target: 它假定存在<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>对象名为`sw`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A> property to programmatically construct a path to a resource that is in a fixed location in the application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A>属性以编程方式构造的资源是在应用程序中的固定位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: The page that references the resource does not have to be located in the same directory as the resource.
trans-unit.target: 引用该资源的页没有位于与资源相同的目录。

trans-unit.source: If you run this example in a Web application that is named WebSite1, `/WebSite1` will be displayed as the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A> property and `/WebSite1/images/Image1.gif` will be displayed as the complete path of the image.
trans-unit.target: 如果你运行此示例中的 Web 应用程序名为 WebSite1，`/WebSite1`将显示的值为<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A>属性和`/WebSite1/images/Image1.gif`将显示为图像的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path of the application root and makes it relative by using the tilde (~) notation for the application root (as in "~/page.aspx").
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序根目录的虚拟路径，并通过对应用程序根目录使用波形符(~)表示法，将该路径转变为相对路径(如 "~/page.aspx" 的形式)。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the application root for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当前请求的应用程序根的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide URL information that will stay the same even if the application changes location.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于提供 URL 将保持相同，即使应用程序更改位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: This allows the same URL-mapping code to be used in a test environment and in the final deployment environment, or to be used by copies of Web applications in different domains.
trans-unit.target: 这样，相同的 URL 映射代码将用于在测试环境中和在最终部署环境中，或要使用的不同域中的 Web 应用程序的副本。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> property to set the URL of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control to an image in the same directory as the page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性设置的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>页位于同一目录中的图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: Run this page at different levels of a directory structure to see the resulting <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 在目录结构，以查看生成的不同级别上运行此页<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> property to programmatically set the path to a resource, based on the current path of the page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性以编程方式将路径设置到资源时，基于页的当前路径。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Performs a binary read of a specified number of bytes from the current input stream.
trans-unit.target: 执行对当前输入流进行指定字节数的二进制读取。

trans-unit.source: A byte array.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.BinaryRead%2A> method is provided for compatibility with ASP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.BinaryRead%2A>提供方法是为了与 ASP 的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 为 0。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="count" /> is greater than the number of bytes available.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 大于可用的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the requesting client's browser capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置有关正在请求的客户端的浏览器功能的信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> object listing the capabilities of the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: 列出客户端浏览器功能的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sends a list of the browser's capabilities back to the client in an HTML page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将发送回 HTML 页中的客户端的浏览器的功能的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current request's client security certificate.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前请求的客户端安全证书。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpClientCertificate" /> object containing information about the client's security certificate settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关客户端安全证书设置的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpClientCertificate" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sends the client's certificate settings back to the client in an HTML page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将发送回 HTML 页中的客户端的客户端的证书设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character set of the entity-body.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置实体主体的字符集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> object representing the client's character set.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端的字符集的 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Default content encoding can be specified in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 中可以指定默认的内容编码[全球化元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7)的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If content encoding is also specified by the client, the default configuration settings are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端还指定内容编码，将重写默认配置设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example assigns a value representing the description of the current HTTP encoding to a string variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将分配一个值，表示当前 HTTP 编码为一个字符串变量的说明。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the length, in bytes, of content sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 指定客户端发送的内容的长度(以字节为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of content sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 客户端发送的内容的长度(以字节为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example assigns the value representing the content length of the incoming request to an integer variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将分配给整型变量表示传入请求的内容长度的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MIME content type of the incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传入请求的 MIME 内容类型。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the MIME content type of the incoming request, for example, "text/html".
trans-unit.target: 表示传入请求的 MIME 内容类型的字符串，例如，"text/html"。

trans-unit.source: Additional common MIME types include "audio.wav", "image/gif", and "application/pdf".
trans-unit.target: 其他常见 MIME 类型包括 "audio.wav"、"image/gif" 和 "application/pdf"。

trans-unit.source: The following code example assigns the value representing the content type of the incoming request to a string variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将分配给字符串变量表示传入请求的内容类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows output that might be produced by this code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示可能由下面的代码生成的输出。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of cookies sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取客户端发送的 cookie 的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCookieCollection" /> object representing the client's cookie variables.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端的 cookie 变量的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCookieCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection accessed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A> collection of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问的集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>包含传输到中的服务器客户端的 cookie`Cookie`标头。

trans-unit.source: The collection accessed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A> collection of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问的集合<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>包含新 cookie 在服务器上创建和传输到客户端在`Set-Cookie`标头。

trans-unit.source: After you add a cookie by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection, the cookie is immediately available in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection, even if the response has not been sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用添加 cookie 后<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合，cookie 可立即在<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合，即使不向客户端发送响应。

trans-unit.source: The following code example loops through all cookies sent by the client and sends the name, expiration date, security parameter, and values of each cookie to the HTTP output.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例循环访问客户端发送的所有 cookie，并将名称、 到期日期、 安全参数和值的每个 cookie 发送到 HTTP 输出。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前请求的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当前请求的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> returns the file path to the currently executing page handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> 返回当前正在执行的页处理文件路径。

trans-unit.source: For redirect scenarios using <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> methods this means that the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> property returns the path to the page redirected to (child page).
trans-unit.target: 对于使用的重定向方案<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法，这意味着，<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性返回的路径重定向到 （子页） 的页。

trans-unit.source: However, when the client is redirected to another page, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.FilePath%2A> property returns the path to the original page.
trans-unit.target: 但是，客户端定向到另一页，<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.FilePath%2A>属性返回原始页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method to HTML-encode the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> property and the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A> method to write the encoded value to the file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the URL http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.FilePath%2A> value is /virdir/page.html.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于 URL http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail、<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.FilePath%2A>值是 /virdir/page.html。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.FilePath%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>填充属性当 HTTP 请求`Content-Type`值为"应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded"或"multipart/窗体的数据"。

trans-unit.target: 集合中的每个名称/值对表示窗体和其值的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.
trans-unit.target: 可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> except that it also copies the bytes that are read to the internal storage that is used by ASP.NET to populate the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A>之处在于它还将读取的字节复制到 ASP.NET 用于填充内部存储<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Because this information is preserved, downstream code such as ASP.NET Web Forms pages (.aspx files) will run successfully.
trans-unit.target: 由于保留了此信息，如 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面(.aspx 文件)这样的下游代码将成功运行。

trans-unit.source: This is not the case with the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 这不同于使用 <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> 方法的情况。

trans-unit.source: The request's entity body has already been loaded and parsed.
trans-unit.target: 已加载和分析请求的实体主体。

trans-unit.source: Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following:
trans-unit.target: 导致加载和分析实体正文的属性的示例包括：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this exception, call the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ReadEntityBodyMode" /> method first.
trans-unit.target: 要避免此异常，请首先调用 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ReadEntityBodyMode" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户在实体正文读取时断开连接，则也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.
trans-unit.target: 可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method provides an alternative to using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的另一种使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A> property waits until the whole request has been received before it returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A>属性等待，直到它返回之前收到整个请求<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> method returns the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A>方法返回<xref:System.IO.Stream>立即对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to begin processing the entity body before the complete contents of the body have been received.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于开始收到正文的完整内容之前处理的实体正文。

trans-unit.source: The entity body (or as much of it as you request and has been received) is returned only when you use the object that is returned by this method to read the stream, by calling methods such as the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 实体正文 （或尽可能它作为你的请求，并已接收） 仅在您使用的对象时，才返回此方法通过调用方法，如读取流，返回<xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You use parameters of the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> method to specify how much of the entity body to read.
trans-unit.target: 使用参数<xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>方法，以指定要读取的实体正文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> object returned by ASP.NET from this method supports both synchronous and asynchronous read methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>对象从此方法由 ASP.NET 支持同步和异步读取的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> object implements both the <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>对象同时实现<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous methods let you asynchronously read the request entity in chunks, while ASP.NET releases the current thread in between each iteration of an asynchronous read loop.
trans-unit.target: 异步方法，可以异步读取请求实体中的区块，同时 ASP.NET 释放当前线程之间的异步读取循环每次迭代。

trans-unit.source: This method can be useful if the request is uploading a large file and you want to begin accessing the file contents before the upload is finished.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求为上载较大的文件，并且你想要开始访问该文件的内容在上载完成之前，此方法会很有用。

trans-unit.source: However, you should only use this method for scenarios where you want to take over all processing of the entity body.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你应仅使用此方法对于方案要接管实体正文的所有处理。

trans-unit.source: This means that you cannot use this method from an .aspx page, because by the time an .aspx page runs, the entity body has already been read.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着你无法使用此方法从.aspx 页面中，这是因为.aspx 页将运行时，实体正文已被读取。

trans-unit.source: The request's entity body has already been loaded and parsed.
trans-unit.target: 已加载和分析请求的实体主体。

trans-unit.source: Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following:

trans-unit.target: 要避免此异常，请首先调用 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ReadEntityBodyMode" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户在实体正文读取时断开连接，则也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to disable the request-length limit; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body, optionally disabling the request-length limit that is set in the <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取能被用于读取正在到来的 HTTP 实体主体的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象，同时随意地禁止设置在 <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength" /> 属性中的请求长度限制。

trans-unit.target: 已加载和分析请求的实体主体。

trans-unit.source: Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following:
trans-unit.target: 导致加载和分析实体正文的属性的示例包括：

trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this exception, call the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ReadEntityBodyMode" /> method first.
trans-unit.target: 要避免此异常，请首先调用 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ReadEntityBodyMode" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户在实体正文读取时断开连接，则也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.target: 获取 HTTP 头集合。

trans-unit.source: Provides a managed wrapper for the IIS method that inserts an HTTP request entity body into memory.
trans-unit.target: 为用于将 HTTP 请求实体正文插入内存的 IIS 方法提供托管包装。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A> method overloads provide managed access to the IIS 7 `IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A>方法重载提供对 IIS 7 的托管的访问`IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody`方法。

trans-unit.source: The IIS method inserts an HTTP request entity body (the data that is posted by a client) into memory.
trans-unit.target: IIS 方法将插入内存的 HTTP 请求实体正文 （客户端发布的数据）。

trans-unit.source: This is useful because IIS does not maintain a copy of the request entity after it has been read.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，因为 IIS 已读取之后不保留一份请求实体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A> methods create a copy of the HTTP request entity data and make it available to IIS for additional custom handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A>方法创建 HTTP 请求实体数据的副本并使其可供 IIS 进行额外的自定义处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A> method overloads work only on IIS 7.0 or later, because the `IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody` method was added in IIS 7.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A>方法重载工作仅 IIS 7.0 或更高版本，因为`IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody`方法已添加在 IIS 7.0 中。

trans-unit.source: Provides IIS with a copy of the HTTP request entity body.
trans-unit.target: 向 IIS 提供 HTTP 请求实体正文的副本。

trans-unit.source: IIS does not maintain a copy of the request after it has been read.
trans-unit.target: 它已被读取后，IIS 不维护一份请求。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is recommended that only the handler for an HTTP request should read the request entity.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议仅 HTTP 请求的处理程序应读取请求实体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload provides IIS with a copy of the request entity if it was previously read by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载向 IIS 提供一份请求实体如果 ASP.NET 已以前读取。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is useful for cases where ASP.NET has read the entity request and you want to reuse the existing request data.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载可用于其中 ASP.NET 具有读取实体请求，但想要重用现有的请求数据的情况。

trans-unit.source: The method was invoked on a version of IIS earlier than IIS 7.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 IIS 7.0 以前的 IIS 版本上调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: For operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在托管环境中操作。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.High" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.High" />

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the request entity data.
trans-unit.target: 包含请求实体数据的数组。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the request entity data.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中开始存储请求实体数据的位置，该位置从零开始计数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read into the <c>buffer</c> array.
trans-unit.target: 要读取到 <c>buffer</c> 数组中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Provides IIS with a copy of the HTTP request entity body and with information about the request entity object.
trans-unit.target: 向 IIS 提供 HTTP 请求实体正文的副本以及有关请求实体对象的信息。

trans-unit.source: IIS does not maintain a copy of the request after it has been read.
trans-unit.target: 它已被读取后，IIS 不维护一份请求。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is recommended that only the handler for an HTTP request should read the request entity.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议仅 HTTP 请求的处理程序应读取请求实体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload is useful when you want to perform custom processing, such as inserting a different entity body into memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InsertEntityBody%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载非常有用，当你想要执行自定义处理，如不同的实体正文插入内存。

trans-unit.source: The method was invoked on a version of IIS earlier than IIS 7.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 IIS 7.0 以前的 IIS 版本上调用该方法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 是负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the request has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示是否验证了请求的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the request is authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求已经过身份验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.IsAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether the current request has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.IsAuthenticated%2A>属性来确定是否当前的请求已经身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If it has not been authenticated, the request is redirected to another page where users can enter their credentials into the Web application.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未验证它，则会将请求重定向到另一页，其中用户可以输入其凭据，到 Web 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This is a common technique used in the default page for an application.
trans-unit.target: 这是在默认页中用于应用程序的常见方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the request is from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示请求是否来自本地计算机的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the request is from the local computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求来自本地计算机，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.IsLocal%2A> property returns `true` if the IP address of the request originator is 127.0.0.1 or if the IP address of the request is the same as the server's IP address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.IsLocal%2A>属性返回`true`如果请求发起方的 IP 地址 127.0.0.1 或请求的 IP 地址是与服务器的 IP 地址相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the HTTP connection uses secure sockets (that is, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 HTTP 连接是否使用安全套接字(即 HTTPS)的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the connection is an SSL connection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接为 SSL 连接，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.IsSecureConnection%2A> property is set to false.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例确定是否<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.IsSecureConnection%2A>属性设置为 false。

trans-unit.source: If it is, the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SuppressContent%2A> property is set to true to stop the response from being sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SuppressContent%2A>属性设置为 true，以停止从所发送响应。

trans-unit.source: The name of the collection member to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的集合成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified object from the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables" /> 集合获取指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables" /> collection member specified in the <paramref name="key" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 参数中指定的 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables" /> 或 <paramref name="key" /> 集合成员。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <paramref name="key" /> is not found, then <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到指定的 <paramref name="key" />，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> type for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前用户的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> object for the current Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) authentication settings.
trans-unit.target: 当前 Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS)身份验证设置的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A> property exposes the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object for the currently connected user to Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A>属性公开的属性和方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>当前连接的用户到 Microsoft Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> class that is exposed by <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A> tracks the IIS request token and provides easy access to this token for the current HTTP request being processed inside of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>由公开的类<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A>跟踪 IIS 请求令牌并提供对此令牌为当前 HTTP 请求在 ASP.NET 内正在处理的轻松访问。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> class is automatically created so it does not need to be constructed to in order to gain access to its methods and properties.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>类将自动创建，因此它不需要构建才能访问其方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A> property for the current user and write out the values of each item in a text file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检索<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A>当前用户并将写出在文本文件中每个项的值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Maps the virtual path in the requested URL to a physical path on the server for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 为当前请求将请求的 URL 中的虚拟路径映射到服务器上的物理路径。

trans-unit.target: 将指定的虚拟路径映射到物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path on the server specified by <paramref name="virtualPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 指定的服务器物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A> property potentially contains sensitive information about the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A>属性可能包含敏感信息有关的宿主环境。

trans-unit.source: The return value should not be displayed to users.
trans-unit.target: 返回值不应该向用户显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A> method to convert a virtual path to a fully qualified physical path on the server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A>方法要转换到服务器上的完全限定的物理路径的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: This example has two parts:
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有两个部分：

trans-unit.source: An .aspx page maps the path, reads the file, and displays results of the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个.aspx 页面的路径映射，读取该文件，并显示读取操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: A class, `UpperCaseFilterStream`, that changes all characters passed through it to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 类， `UpperCaseFilterStream`，更改为大写形式传递它的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the example shows how to convert a virtual path to a fully qualified physical path using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第一部分演示如何将虚拟路径转换为完全限定的物理路径使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This physical path is then passed to a <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> object, which obtains the contents of the file.
trans-unit.target: 然后传递给此物理路径<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>对象，它可以通过获取文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> method is then called to display the content of the file on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A>方法然后调用以显示在页面上的文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A> property is used to attach a filter to the response stream that makes the text displayed to the page all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A>属性用于将筛选器附加到使到全部大写页上显示的文本的响应流。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows a class that inherits from <xref:System.IO.Stream> and converts all characters in a stream to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分显示继承自的类<xref:System.IO.Stream>，并将流中的所有字符都转换为大写形式。

trans-unit.target: 当前应用程序的根目录的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalApplicationPath%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical file system path corresponding to the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: 获取与请求的 URL 相对应的物理文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: The file system path of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当前请求的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: In redirect scenarios using <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalPath%2A> property returns the path to the original page.
trans-unit.target: 在使用的重定向方案<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>、<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalPath%2A>属性返回原始页的路径。

trans-unit.source: To find the physical path of the currently executing page use the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A> method with the input argument set as the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找当前正在执行的页使用的物理路径<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A>方法并将输入参数设置为<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method to HTML-encode the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalPath%2A> property and the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A> method to write the encoded value to the file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalPath%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of HTTP query string variables.
trans-unit.target: 获取 HTTP 查询字符串变量集合。

trans-unit.source: The query string variables sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 客户端发送的查询字符串变量。

trans-unit.source: Keys and values are URL-decoded.
trans-unit.target: 键和值是 URL 解码。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows two ways to get the value of a query string variable named "fullname".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示两种方式来获取名为"fullname"的查询字符串变量的值。

trans-unit.source: In each case, if the URL is `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?fullname=Fadi%20Fakhouri`, then the value returned is "Fadi Fakhouri" because the `%20` is URL-decoded into a space character.
trans-unit.target: 在每个情况下，如果 URL 是`http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?fullname=Fadi%20Fakhouri`，则返回的值是"Fadi Fakhouri"，因为`%20`是 URL 解码为一个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: If the URL doesn’t have a `fullname` query string ID, the returned value would be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 URL 不具有`fullname`查询字符串 ID，返回的值将为`null`。

trans-unit.source: The first line of code looks for the key "fullname" only in the query string; the second line looks for the key "fullname" in all of the HTTP request collections.
trans-unit.target: 第一行代码查找密钥仅在查询字符串中; 中的"fullname"第二行查找密钥"fullname"中的所有 HTTP 请求集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the second line, see <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Item%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 第二个行有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Item%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the raw URL of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前请求的原始 URL。

trans-unit.source: The raw URL of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当前请求的原始 URL。

trans-unit.source: The raw URL is defined as the part of the URL following the domain information.
trans-unit.target: 原始 URL 定义为以下的域信息的 URL 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: In the URL string http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx, the raw URL is /articles/recent.aspx.
trans-unit.target: URL 字符串中http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx，原始的 URL 是 /articles/recent.aspx。

trans-unit.source: The raw URL includes the query string, if present.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，原始的 URL 包括查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method to HTML-encode the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.RawUrl%2A> property and the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A> method to write the encoded value to the file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.RawUrl%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the request entity body has been read, and if so, how it was read.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已读取请求实体主体，若已读取，是以何方式读取。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates how the request entity body was read, or that it has not been read.
trans-unit.target: 该值指示是否已读取请求实体主体，若已读取，是以何方式读取。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to avoid the exception that is thrown if the entity body has already been read and an attempt is made to read it by using an incompatible method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于避免如果已读取的实体主体，并尝试读取它通过使用不兼容方法引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties that read the entity body include the following:
trans-unit.target: 方法和读取的实体正文的属性包括：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> instance of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前请求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> instance of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当前请求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: For non-routed requests, the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> object that is returned is empty.
trans-unit.target: 对于非路由请求，返回的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> 对象为空。

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteData> object for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供访问权限<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteData>为当前请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ASP.NET routing, see.[ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).
trans-unit.target: 有关 ASP.NET 路由的详细信息，请参阅。[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP data transfer method (<see langword="GET" /> or <see langword="POST" />) used by the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置客户端使用的 HTTP 数据传输方法(<see langword="GET" /> 或 <see langword="POST" />)。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the HTTP invocation type sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端发送的 HTTP 调用类型的字符串。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.RequestType%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: The physical drive path.
trans-unit.target: 物理驱动器路径。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether an HTTP header should be saved to disk.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否应将 HTTP 标头保存到磁盘的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Saves an HTTP request to disk.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP 请求保存到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Saving the request context to disk can be useful in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 保存到磁盘的请求上下文可以用于调试。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.SaveAs%2A> method when a page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.SaveAs%2A>方法，当加载页。

trans-unit.source: The call specifies that the request be saved as a text file in a directory where the ASP.NET process identity has been granted write permissions, and that any header information included in the request is included in the file.
trans-unit.target: 调用指定请求将另存为其中的 ASP.NET 进程标识和授予的写入权限，包括在请求中的任何标头信息包含在文件的目录中的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequireRootedSaveAsPath" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection" /> is set to <see langword="true" /> but <paramref name="filename" /> is not an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequireRootedSaveAsPath" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />，但 <paramref name="filename" /> 不是绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of Web server variables.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Web 服务器变量的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> of server variables.
trans-unit.target: 服务器变量的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: For a list of server variables supported by IIS, see [IIS Server Variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=52471).
trans-unit.target: 有关支持的 IIS 服务器变量的列表，请参阅[IIS 服务器变量](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=52471)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the names and values of all named server variables.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示的名称和所有命名的服务器变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> object that is tripped when a request times out.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求超时时去除的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The timeout period can be specified in the Web.config file (see <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.ExecutionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) or programmatically (see <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 可以在 Web.config 文件中指定的超时期限 (请参阅<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.ExecutionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 或以编程方式 (请参阅<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: The timeout period is measured from the time the request comes in.
trans-unit.target: 从请求传入的时间为单位的超时期限。

trans-unit.source: If the default timeout of 110 seconds is in effect, the cancellation token will be tripped no earlier than 110 seconds after request processing begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果默认超时为 110 秒有效时，将不早于 110 秒在请求处理开始后触发取消标记。

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value, and as long this token hasn't tripped yet, the new timeout value will be respected.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值，并且尚未尚未触发长此令牌，如新的超时值将遵循此提示。

trans-unit.source: Currently the token only provides 15 second granularity, which means that if the timeout value is 110 seconds, the token will be tripped sometime between 110 and 125 seconds after request processing begins.
trans-unit.target: 当前令牌仅提供 15 秒的粒度级，这意味着，如果超时值为 110 秒，将一段时间之间 110 和 125 秒在请求处理开始后触发令牌。

trans-unit.source: The granularity may change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 粒度可能在以后发生更改。

trans-unit.source: Even though this property is thread-safe, there are restrictions on its use.
trans-unit.target: 即使此属性是线程安全的没有对其使用限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClientDisconnectedToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClientDisconnectedToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This property is meaningless if WebSockets request processing has started.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是 Websocket 请求处理已启动的情况下无意义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the TLS token binding information.
trans-unit.target: 获取 TLS 标记绑定信息。

trans-unit.source: The property enables applications to retrieve token information from incoming HTTP requests for enhanced authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使应用程序可以从传入的增强身份验证的 HTTP 请求检索令牌信息。

trans-unit.source: The binding token for the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 当前连接的绑定令牌。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` on non-windows10 platforms.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`null`在非 windows 10 平台上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes in the current input stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前输入流中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 输入流中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TotalBytes%2A> property value is greater than 1000 bytes and writes that information to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例确定是否<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TotalBytes%2A>属性值大于 1000 个字节，并将该信息写入文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTTP request values without triggering request validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取 HTTP 请求值，不触发请求验证。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request values that have not been checked using request validation.
trans-unit.target: 尚未使用请求验证检查的 HTTP 请求值。

trans-unit.source: Request validation checks for HTML markup and script that might indicate a potential cross-site scripting attack.
trans-unit.target: 请求为 HTML 标记和脚本可能表明潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的验证检查。

trans-unit.source: By default, all values are checked using request validation and if any values contain markup or script, ASP.NET throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用请求验证检查的所有值，如果任何值包含标记或脚本，ASP.NET 将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException>异常。

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you anticipate that the request will contain markup (for example, you are allowing users to post content that contains markup) and you want to get the raw value of a request.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，如果你预料到的请求将包含标记 （例如，你允许用户发布的内容，其中包含标记） 和你想要获取请求的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the URL of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关当前请求的 URL 的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object that contains the URL of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前请求的 URL <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的对象。

trans-unit.target: 获取有关客户端上次请求的 URL 的信息，该请求链接到当前的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of two properties of the URL that referred the client to the current application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示的客户端与当前的应用程序的 URL 的两个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP <see langword="Referer" /> request header is malformed and cannot be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object.
trans-unit.target: HTTP <see langword="Referer" /> 请求标头格式不正确，并且不能转换为 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the raw user agent string of the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取客户端浏览器的原始用户代理信息。

trans-unit.source: The raw user agent string of the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 客户端浏览器的原始用户代理信息。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将请求的浏览器的类型标识分配给字符串变量。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserHostAddress%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the DNS name of the remote client.
trans-unit.target: 获取远程客户端的 DNS 名称。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the remote client.
trans-unit.target: 远程客户端的 DNS 名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method to HTML-encode the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserHostName%2A> property and the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A> method to write the encoded value to the file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>进行 HTML 编码的方法的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserHostName%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLine%2A>方法以向文件写入经过编码的值。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a sorted string array of client language preferences.
trans-unit.target: 获取客户端语言首选项的排序字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: A sorted string array of client language preferences, or <see langword="null" /> if empty.
trans-unit.target: 经过排序的客户端语言首选项的字符串数组，或者，如果为空，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example captures the multiple values returned by the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserLanguages%2A> property into a string array and writes each language name to a separate line of HTTP output.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例通过返回的多个值捕获<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserLanguages%2A>属性转换成字符串数组，并将每个语言名称写入 HTTP 输出的单独的行。

trans-unit.source: The language names are provided by the browser, and there is no definitive list of all possible codes.
trans-unit.target: 语言名称由浏览器中，并且没有权威所有可能的代码的列表。

trans-unit.source: Typically these consist of a two-character codes for the language, a hyphen, and a two-character code for the culture, such as "en-us" for U.S. English and "fr-ca" for Canadian French.
trans-unit.target: 通常这些包含的语言、 连字符，以及对于区域性的两个字符的代码的两个字符代码如"en-我们"适用于美国英语和"fr 的 ca"加拿大法语。

trans-unit.source: Causes validation to occur for the collections accessed through the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" />, and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 引发对通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies" /> 、<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 属性访问的集合的验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class uses input validation flags to track whether to perform validation on the request collections accessed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类使用的输入的验证标志以跟踪是否通过访问的请求集合上执行验证<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ValidateInput%2A> method sets these flags so that when the get accessors for the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A> property are invoked, input validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ValidateInput%2A>方法设置这些标志这样，当 get 访问器<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>调用属性、 输入验证。

trans-unit.source: Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
trans-unit.target: 验证工作原理是检查所有输入的数据与潜在的危险数据的硬编码列表。

trans-unit.source: If the validation feature is enabled by page directive or configuration, this method is called during the page's `ProcessRequest` processing phase.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过页指令或配置启用了验证功能，在该页面的过程中调用此方法`ProcessRequest`处理阶段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ValidateInput%2A> method can be called by your code if the validation feature is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ValidateInput%2A>可以由你的代码调用方法，如果未启用验证功能。

trans-unit.source: Potentially dangerous data was received from the client.
trans-unit.target: 从客户端接收到具有潜在危险的数据。
